remarks: The predicate " ` F ` is a measurable function".  A function is measurable iff the preimages of all open intervals are measurable sets in the sense of ~ ismbl .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)
statement:
ismbf $p |- ( F : A --> RR -> ( F e. MblFn <-> A. x e. ran (,) ( `' F " x ) e. dom vol ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
